channel.title: Elastic Search on Techtaste
channel.description: Recent content in Elastic Search on Techtaste

item.title: Elastic Search Basics
item.description: Elastic Search Concepts Cluster Node Index Type Document Shard Replica Cluster It’s a collection of one or more nodes and holds entire data and provides indexing & search capabilities. Nodes can join a cluster by cluster’s name. Node A node is a single server(part of the cluster) and participates in indexing and search capabilities. Node can be configured to join specific cluster by the cluster name.
